overview: It’s tough being at the top, and as DreamBoy Hotel manager, JP Dubois is feeling the stress of everything going wrong so soon after the Grand Opening. With messed up rooms, cum covered luggage, no A/C and deliveries being fucked up, there’s no-where he can turn to but the masseur to relieve some stress, but even that goes awry! The Hotel is packed full of hung fuckers and hungry bottoms as normal, but it’s up to JP and his crew to get through this, or at least enjoy the journey and make sure the guests are smiling and satisfied; they can easily do this part!
title: The DreamBoy Hotel: Tight Fix
